alert.note: Alert for Graham; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 13 at 9:45PM EST until January 16 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches possible. * WHERE...Swain and Graham Counties. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow, sleet, or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or your favorite source of weather information for the latest updates. Additional details can be found at www.weather.gov/gsp.
